feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-19T12:10:07.744999Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;OpenLLM</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/bentoml/OpenLLM</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T08:09:48.985461Z</updated >; <link href="https://github.com/bentoml/OpenLLM"/>; <author>; <name>;fzliu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fzliu< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bentoml/OpenLLM/main/assets/main-banner.png" style="宽度：220px ; 高度：124px;" />;<br />;用于在生产中运行大型语言模型 (LLM) 的开放平台。轻松微调、服务、部署和监控任何 LLM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openllm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36388219" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;在 Apple 设备上显示比白色更亮的颜色</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/dtinth/superwhite</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T10:09:48.986186Z</已更新>; <link href="https://github.com/dtinth/superwhite"/>; <author>; <name>;ash</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ash </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://github-production-user-asset-6210df.s3.amazonaws.com/510678/246795850-d4f667fd-7a06-4375 -a357-fa4e4e71d4c6.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：191px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了 Apple 设备的显示功能，特别是显示比白色更亮的颜色的能力。此功能是通过使用先进技术实现的，并允许在 Apple 设备上呈现更加生动逼真的视觉效果。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#display-brighter-than-white-color-on-apple-devices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36389285" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：Slint - 用 Rust 编写的用于嵌入式和桌面的声明式 UI 工具包</stitle>; <id>;https://slint.dev</id >; <updated>;2023-06-19T09:09:48.987007Z</updated>; <link href="https://slint.dev"/>; <author>; <name>;ogoffart</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ogoffart</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://slint.dev/assets/img/responsive.png" 样式="宽度：220px；高度：143px；" />;<br />;使用实时预览通过快速迭代完成您的 UI 设计。调整所有内容，例如颜色、动画、几何图形或文本，并立即验证更改。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-slint-a-declarative-ui-toolkit-written-in-rust-for-embedded-desktop" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388821" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们试图预订一张火车票，结果导致 245,000 条记录数据泄露</stitle>; <id>; https://zerforschung.org/posts/freundschaftspass-en/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T09:09:48.987451Z</更新>; <link href="https://zerforschung.org/posts/ freundschaftspass-en/"/>; <author>; <name>;mrzool</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mrzool</uri>; </author>; <content type="html "<img src="https://zerforschung.org/p/freundschaftspass/fr-de-freundschaftspass-titel-small.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：128px；" />;<br />;为了庆祝法德友谊，德国交通部长维辛和他的法国交通部长博纳提出了一些特别的东西：每个国家为 18 至 27 岁的年轻人在德国和法国旅行提供 30,000 张免费的欧洲火车票。然而，分发 Interrail 通票时出现了很多问题。在下文中，我们想带您了解实施不太完善的票证的各个阶段，并向您展示如何在注册结束后仍能获得通行证。在我们进行中的同时，我们还将查看欧盟级别的类似项目中的安全漏洞。由同一个机构实施——这使得大约 245,000 份注册数据在网络上几乎没有受到保护。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#we-tried-to-book-a-train-ticket-and-ended-up-with-a-245000-records-data-breach" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388828" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我对 Nix 的第一印象</stitle>; <id>;https://mtlynch .io/notes/nix-first-impressions/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T07:09:48.987832Z</更新>; <link href="https://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first -impressions/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://d33wubrfki0l68.cloudfront.net/ae57cc51889fbe1643c1a73bbd2f7e83afe3be70/aac5f/notes/nix-first-impressions/hashimoto-tweet.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：154px；" />;<br />;Nix是一个根据源文件配置软件环境的工具。它允许您在源代码中定义计算机系统的配置，并使系统进入该状态。 Nix 旨在配置其所在的环境，而 Ansible 旨在通过网络配置系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-first-impressions-of-nix" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36387874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Sketch.systems</stitle>; <id>;https://sketch.systems</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T06:09:48.988204Z</updated>; < link href="https://sketch.systems"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;Sketch.systems 是一种草图绘制工具，它基于 David Harel 在 1980 年代开发的状态图形式主义。它允许用户通过单击图表来浏览系统草图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sketch-systems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36378731" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;我们需要更多而不是更少的 Richard Stallman</stitle>; <id>;https://ploum.net/2023-06-19-more-rms.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -19T11:34:48.988568Z</updated>; <link href="https://ploum.net/2023-06-19-more-rms.html"/>; <author>; <name>;bertman</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bertman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ploum.net/files/rms2019. jpg" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 147px;" />;<br />;理查德·斯托曼 (Richard Stallman) 的历史视野和原创思想在今天仍然适用。他对软件转变为由公司控制的产品和集体智慧的丧失提出了警告。他发明了 copyleft 作为保证用户权利和维护公共资源的解决方案。然而，自由软件运动一直被企业开源所掩盖，RMS 一直受到批评和误解。我们需要接受他的核心理念，并通过使用 copyleft 许可证来保护公共资源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#we-need-more-of-richard-stallman-not-less" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36389805" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 FPGA 上构建网络键值存储</stitle>; <id>;https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS /</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T05:09:48.989504Z</updated>; <link href="https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS/"/>; <author>; <名称>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// adamwalker.github.io/images/arty.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于在功能性硬件描述语言 Clash 中构建基于 FPGA 的网络键值存储。它描述了 FPGA 定制的哈希表设计、测试框架及其性能和资源使用情况。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-networked-key-value-store-on-an-fpga" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387477" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;同时在 3 个游戏机上发布一款独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://juicybeast.com/2016 /01/11/releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T04:09:48.990403Z </更新>; <link href="https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2- years"/>; <author>; <name>;plateofsoup</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=plateofsoup</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="http://juicybeast.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/legrimpeur_HD_cropped.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;一次在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles -at-once-and-failing-financially-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387030" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;隐形训练摩托车手 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x94PGgYKHQ0</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T08:09:48.990777Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x94PGgYKHQ0"/>; <author>; <name>;dsego</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dsego </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/x94PGgYKHQ0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; < a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#invisibility-training-for-motorcyclists-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36375118" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;MusicGen-Looper：根据文本提示生成固定 bpm 循环</stitle>; <id>;https://replicate.com/andreasjansson/musicgen-looper</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-19T10:09:48.991156Z</updated>; <link href="https://replicate.com/andreasjansson/musicgen-looper"/>; <author>; <name>;fagerhult</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fagerhult</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://og.replicate.com/api/models/andreasjansson/ musicgen-looper" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;通过 MusicGen 运行提示符生成一段音乐，然后 BeatNet 检测节拍和强拍。使用 MusicGen 的延续功能创建变体，所有变体都经过时间拉伸以匹配准确请求速度。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#musicgen-looper-generate-fixed-bpm-loops-from-text-prompts" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388919" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Keycloak – 开源身份和访问管理访谈</stitle>; <id>;https://console.substack.com/ i/128451029/interview-with-michal-of-keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-for-modern-applications</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T22:09:48.991532Z</已更新>; <link href="https://console.substack.com/i/128451029/interview-with-michal-of-keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-for-modern-applications"/ >; <author>; <name>;ph4ni</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ph4ni</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic %2Fimages%2F1f02d299-2c64-4e17-a333-47d3054df48d_1600x836.png" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Keycloak 是一种用于现代应用程序和服务的开源身份和访问管理解决方案。它提供了一种简单而安全的身份验证和用户管理方法，支持 OpenID Connect、OAuth 等标准协议2.0 和 SAML。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-interview" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36384636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;HDR二维码</stitle>; <id>;https://notes.dt.in.th/HDRQRCode</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T22:09:48.991894Z</更新>; <link href="https://notes.dt.in.th/HDRQRCode"/>; <author>; <name>;fdb</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fdb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://notes.dt.in.th/d7fc70 -circle-192.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;这是一个 HDR 二维码。如果您在 Apple 设备的内置显示器上查看它，它应该可以工作。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#hdr-qr-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36384625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MoonRay – 梦工厂的开源MCRT 渲染器</stitle>; <id>;https://openmoonray.org/download</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T08:09:48.992273Z</updated>; <link href="https://openmoonray. org/download"/>; <author>; <name>;ColinWright</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ColinWright</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;GitHub 上的 openmoonray 存储库是 MoonRay 开源的顶级存储库。实际的源代码包含在许多其他作为 git 子模块引用的存储库中。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# moonray-dreamworks-open-source-mcrt-renderer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388433" target="_blank ">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何计算带有 50M Toffoli 门的 256 位椭圆曲线密钥</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.08585</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T05:09:48.992652Z</updated>; < link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.08585"/>; <author>; <name>;aburan28</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aburan28</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;我们使用 Shor 算法计算椭圆曲线私钥，作为硅光子学启发的活动体积架构中资源估计的案例研究。非本地连接降低了每次成本与 2D 局部架构相比，键值提高了 300-700 倍。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-compute-a-256-bit-elliptic-curve-key-with -50m-toffoli-gates" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387371" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;世界上有多少沉船海洋？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-worlds-oceans</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-19T01:09:48.993018Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-worlds-海洋"/>; <author>; <name>;Thevet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Thevet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; img src="https://ychef.files.bbci.co.uk/976x549/p0ft978s.jpg" style="宽度：220px； height: 124px;" />;<br />;本周联合国教科文组织宣布发现三艘新沉船，其中两艘已有数千年历史。根据联合国教科文组织的分析，世界海洋中有超过三百万艘未被发现的沉船。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-world-s-oceans" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36374370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Openjob：最好的分布式任务调度框架</stitle>; <id>;https://habr.com/en/articles/742470/< /id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T04:09:48.993730Z</updated>; <link href="https://habr.com/en/articles/742470/"/>; <author>; <name>;swoft< /名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=swoft</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hsto.org/ r/w1560/getpro/habr/upload_files/77e/f01/d41/77ef01d419ec7e321f7f576030789d23.png" style="width: 220px; height: 123px;" />;<br />;Openjob是一个分布式、高性能的任务调度框架，支持多个cronjob、延时任务、工作流，轻量级分布式计算，无限水平扩展，具有高扩展性和容错性。同时具有完善的权限管理，强大的告警监控，支持多语言<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openjob-best-distributed-task-scheduling-framework" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387141" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GPU 编程：何时、为何以及如何？</stitle>; <id>;https://enccs.github.io/ gpu-programming/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T01:09:48.994191Z</updated>; <link href="https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/"/>; <作者>; <name>;转译</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/_static/ENCCS.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 236px;" />;<br />;图形处理单元 (GPU) 是全球许多高性能计算 (HPC) 系统的主力。Top500 中启用 GPU 的超级计算机的数量近年来一直在稳步增长并且这种发展有望继续。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gpu-programming-when-why-and-how" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36385938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;旅行报告：保加利亚瓦尔纳夏季 ISO C++ 标准会议</stitle>; <id>;https://herbsutter.com/2023/ 06/16/trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-varna-bulgaria/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T03:09:48.994595Z</更新>; <link href="https: //herbsutter.com/2023/06/16/trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-varna-bulgaria/"/>; <author>; <name>;agluszak</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=agluszak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://herbsutter.files.wordpress.com/2023/06/image .png?w=300" style="宽度: 220px; height: 162px;" />;<br />;ISO C++ 委员会最近结束了在保加利亚瓦尔纳举行的会议，他们开始在 C++26 中采用特性。他们有来自 20 个国家的近 180 名与会者，并采纳了前 40 个提议更改 C++26 的文件，包括错误修复和新功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-in-varna-bulgaria " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36373972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Swing VPN 应用是一个 DDoS 僵尸网络</stitle>; <id>; https://lecromee.github.io/posts/swing_vpn_ddosing_sites/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T19:09:48.995730Z</更新>; <link href="https://lecromee.github.io/ posts/swing_vpn_ddosing_sites/"/>; <author>; <name>;campuscodi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=campuscodi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://lecromee.github.io/image/swing/android_install.png" style="width: 220px; height: 107px;" />;<br />;Swing VPN 应用程序通过将其用户转变为攻击僵尸网络，利用其用户群对 DDOS 站点进行攻击。该应用程序每 10 秒向特定网站发送一次请求，以特定端点为目标使网络过载服务器的资源。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#swing-vpn-app-is-a-ddos-botnet" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= “https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36382700” target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1990 年代的神经网络</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/id_aa_carmack/status/1670558589746905090</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-19T00:09:48.996472Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/id_aa_carmack/status/1670558589746905090"/>; <author>; <name>;jrott</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jrott</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但别担心——让我们再试一次。<a href= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/#neural-networks-in-the-1990s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36385809" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;想象中的问题是不良软件的根源</stitle>; <id>;https://cerebralab.com/Imaginary_Problems_Are_the_Root_of_Bad_Software</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T15:09:48.996851Z</已更新>; <link href="https://cerebralab.com/Imaginary_Problems_Are_the_Root_of_Bad_Software"/>; <author>; <name>;deofoo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=deofoo</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c0/De_Rebus_Bellicis,_XVth_Century_Miniature.JPG" style="width: 220px; height: 148px;" />;<br />;糟糕软件的根本原因往往是虚构的问题。开发人员和其他部门创造虚构的问题来使他们的工作更有趣或填补空白。这导致忽视了真正的问题需要解决。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#imaginary-problems-are-the-root-of-bad-software" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36380711" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;苏联向美国出售钛，认为他们需要它来制作披萨烤箱</stitle>; <id>;https://theaviationgeekclub.com/在 1960 年代初期，苏联将钛卖给了我们，他们相信他们需要它来制作披萨烤箱，但他们却用它来建造- the-iconic-sr-71-blackbird-mach-3-spy-plane/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T22:09:48.997222Z</updated>; <link href="https://theaviationgeekclub. com/in-the-early-1960s-soviet-union-sold-titanium-to-the-us-believing-they-needed-it-for-pizza-ovens-but-instead-they-used-it-to- build-the-iconic-sr-71-blackbird-mach-3-spy-plane/"/>; <author>; <name>;jerryjerryjerry</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =jerryjerryjerry</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://theaviationgeekclub.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/SR-71-披萨烤箱.jpg " style="宽度: 220px; height: 136px;" />;<br />;远程侦察机 SR-71 黑鸟的建造需要钛。美国秘密从他们的冷战敌人苏联购买钛来建造 SR- 71. 苏联人认为美国需要钛来制作披萨烤箱，却不知道他们正在为制造间谍飞机做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#soviet-union-sold-titanium- to-us-believing-they-needed-it-for-pizza-ovens" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36384548" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;很棒的 Lemmy 实例</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T07:09:48.997585Z</updated>; < link href="https://github.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=雷电</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances/main/lemmy-migration-find-subreddits- communities.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;不同 Lemmy 实例的比较。通过在 GitHub 上创建帐户为 maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances 开发做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# awesome-lemmy-instances" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387939" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>;
